Nov. 24, 1996 D SEWBBA (Treorchy) Contest (Championship Section)
SEWBBA (Treorchy) Contest (Championship Section) 1 Own Choice Test Piece Contest SEWBBA (Treorchy) Contest sewbba-treorchy-contest-championship-section
Entertainments Contest
Parc & Dare Theatre, Treorchy, Rhondda Cynon Taf, Wales, UK Best Instrumentalist: Ian Williams (cornet) Cory Best Trombone: Tredegar Prizes - 1st £100, 2nd £60, 3rd £40. 7 bands competed.
Feb. 27, 2011, 12:40 a.m. July 2, 2020, 3:15 p.m.
1 Tredegar Town Band Nicholas Childs
2 Cory Band Jeremy Wise
3 BTM Band Melvin White
